<title level="1" right="Action">[Enhance Campfire](/Actions.aspx?ID=1492) <actions string="" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Camping" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=465" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 100</row>

</column>

---

_Nethys note: This camping activity requires that Kanerah is camping with the PCs (but see [Learn from a Companion](/Actions.aspx?ID=1477))._

Kanerah expertly controls the campfire's exact temperature, making it easier to prepare meals. All [cooking activities](/Rules.aspx?ID=1889) that take place for the remainder of the camping session gain a +1 circumstance bonus. This bonus increases to +2 if the PCs are at least 11th level.
name: Enhance Campfire
